# NETWORK::NETWORK_OVERRIDE_CLOCK_TIME

## Summary
Overrides the game clock time for the local player only. Other players will not be informed about the change in time

## Parameters
* **INT** hour: The time to set locally in hours
* **INT** minute: The time to set locally in minutes
* **INT** second: The time to set locally in seconds

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Works in Singleplayer too.
Passing wrong data (e.g. hours above 23) will cause the game to crash.
